## Checklist

Before submitting this PR, please ensure:

- [ ] I have run `black .` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `isort .` to sort my imports
- [ ] I have run `flake8 .` to check for linting errors
- [ ] I have cleared outputs from Jupyter notebooks (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] All CI checks are passing
